item.title: Creating Blog Site using Hugo
item.author: kusnaditjung@yahoo.com (Kusnadi)
item.description: Hi, this is my first post for my GitHub blog. I created this post using Hugo. I have used Blogspot for blogging for a while, and I found the blogging experience is less desirable, unresponsive, and slow. I was looking for a static website generator for my github.io pages. In this post, however, I focus only the Hugo first. The hosting on Github.io comes in the next post. You can create a Hugo website, run it locally in a console, and view it in a browser while in development or writing mode.
